title: Updates on Carolingian UI
content:
Version 2.3.0:

  • Themes applied to actor sheets: Your chosen color theme is now applied to actor sheets, both PC and NPC. I've also added horizontal tabs for sheets, as many people forget which icon means what (myself included). You can disable this is style settings.

Version 2.2.0:

  • Hide UI: Added settings that allow completely hiding interface elements.

Check more on Discord or the Github repository.

Note: Version 2.x of Carolingian UI is for Foundry v13. If you are using v12, install a version that starts with 1.x.
